==Spanish==

===Etymology===
From {{af|es|a-|brazo|t2=arm|-ar}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{es-IPA}}
* {{audio|es|Es-abrazar.ogg|Audio}}
* {{homophones|es|abrasar}} {{a|in dialects without distinction between S and Z}}

===Verb===
{{es-verb}}

# {{lb|es|transitive}} to [[hug]], to [[embrace]] (a person, an animal)
